rows.label: qev012404_MSG0001
rows.name:
You the [ST:gender p1=guy p2=gal ] Howard mentioned?
He said someone was bringing parts so we
could get the heli up and running again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012404_MSG0002
rows.name:
Okay, yeah. These are perfect. Should be all
we need to patch the main rotor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012404_MSG0003
rows.name:
Er, but to be honest...I don't really know
how to go about doing that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012404_MSG0004
rows.name:
Like, do I connect this part to the red wire?
Or is it the blue one?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012404_MSG0005
rows.name:
Frankly, I could care less as long as it flies,
but Howard would have a conniption fit if
I said that in front of him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012404_MSG0006
rows.name:
We actually just had another fight before you showed
up. Jerk ended up chasing me out of the heli.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012404_MSG0007
rows.name:
Anyway, maybe you should take charge of
these repairs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012404_MSG0008
rows.name:
If I touch it and the thing crashes again,
I'll never hear the end of itâ€”but he wouldn't
dare say anything to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012404_MSG0009
rows.name:
Well, he might not be saying much to
ANYONE if we crash, right? Ha ha!
Little gallows humor there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012404_MSG0010
rows.name: It's the main rotor that needs fixing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012404_MSG0011
rows.name:
I can't remember whether you hook up
the red wire or the blue one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012404_MSG0012
rows.name:
Pretty sure it'll fly either way, so maybe just
pick one at random and move on?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012404_MSG0013
rows.name: Looks like you've wrapped up the repairs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012404_MSG0014
rows.name:
Slap a few random parts in and we're back
in the air. Who knew it'd be that easy?
Even the tail rotor's behaving.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012404_MSG0015
rows.name: Thanks for the help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012404_MSG0016
rows.name:
You're a helicopter-repair expert and a damn
sight tougher than Howard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012404_MSG0017
rows.name: Roscoe really outdid himself with you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012404_MSG0018
rows.name:
I'll make sure he pays you once we're back in New LA.
Let's all meet up back where you first met him, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012404_MSG0019
rows.name:
Now we just have to get back to the city
without another huge fight...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012404_MSG0022
rows.name:
You the [ST:gender p1=guy p2=gal ] Howard mentioned?
He said you'd be bringing parts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012404_MSG0023
rows.name: You can find the anhydrous radiators in Primordia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012404_MSG0024
rows.name:
And apparently you can get the spherical
electromagnetic motor in the crags northeast
of the Great Nail in Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012404_MSG0025
rows.name:
On-site procurement's a real drag, huh?
Sucks, but that's the job.[ST:wait ]
